name: yabai
title: Yabai
description: Control Yabai using Raycast. Requires yabai to be installed.
author: krzysztoff1

commands.name: screens-menu-bar
commands.title: Show Current Screen
commands.description: Update the status information about the currently selected screen.

commands.name: windows-list-current-space
commands.title: Windows List by Current Space
commands.description: Show the application of the current space.

commands.name: toggle
commands.title: Toggle Yabai
commands.description: This command will start Yabai using `yabai --start-service` or stop it using `yabai --stop-service`.

commands.name: mirror-x
commands.title: Mirror X
commands.description: Mirror the tree on the X axis.

commands.name: mirror-y
commands.title: Mirror Y
commands.description: Mirror the tree on the Y axis.

commands.name: layout-bsp
commands.title: Layout BSP
commands.description: Switch to BSP layout for the current space.

commands.name: layout-stack
commands.title: Layout Stack
commands.description: Switch to stack layout for the current space.

commands.name: layout-float
commands.title: Layout Float
commands.description: Switch to float layout for the current space.

commands.name: create-space-and-focus
commands.title: Create & Focus New Space
commands.subtitle: yabai
commands.description: Creates a new workspace and focuses it.

preferences.name: yabaiPath
preferences.title: Yabai installation path
preferences.description: Location to the Yabai installation (Defaults to `/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai` on M1 Macs, and `/usr/local/bin/yabai` otherwise)
